description: This file defines React components for an avatar UI element, utilizing Radix UI's avatar primitives and utility functions for styling.

methods.name: Avatar
methods.description: React component that renders an avatar container with customizable className and children.

methods.name: AvatarImage
methods.description: React component that renders an avatar image with styling and spreads received props.

methods.name: AvatarFallback
methods.description: React component that renders a fallback UI for the avatar, typically used when image fails to load.
